scripts.dev: export APP_BRANCH=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD); ROUTER_BASE=/player/ nuxt
scripts.generate: export APP_BRANCH=dev; ROUTER_BASE="/player-dev/" nuxt generate --devtools; echo $APP_BRANCH
scripts.upload:
export APP_BRANCH=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD); tar czf - dist/ | ssh dnbradio "rm -rf ".dnbradio-deploy-$APP_BRANCH"; mkdir -p "./.dnbradio-deploy-$APP_BRANCH"; cd "./.dnbradio-deploy-$APP_BRANCH" && tar xvzf - && rm -rf "/root/apps/www/html/player-$APP_BRANCH" && mv dist "/root/apps/www/html/player-$APP_BRANCH""; echo "

Deployed to -> https://dnbradio.com/player-$APP_BRANCH/"
scripts.debug: export APP_BRANCH=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD); nuxt generate --devtools && nuxt start
scripts.upload-prod:
tar czf - dist/ | ssh dnbradio 'rm -rf .dnbradio-deploy-tmp; mkdir -p ./.dnbradio-deploy-tmp; cd ./.dnbradio-deploy-tmp && tar xvzf - && rm -rf /var/www/dnbradio_site/html/player && mv dist /var/www/dnbradio_site/html/player';  echo "

Deployed to -> https://dnbradio.com/player/"
scripts.start: export APP_BRANCH=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD); ROUTER_BASE=/player/ nuxt start
scripts.build: export APP_BRANCH=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD); ROUTER_BASE="/player-$APP_BRANCH/" nuxt build
